title: Circus Star needed to match the attached image please?
content:
Hi there,

I have the dusty circus font but need the same circus style that includes the shape of a star.

Even a vector shape would do.

Any ideas?

Thanks in advance

Mark

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803130157im_/http:/typophile.com/files/F_5365.jpg)
author: markcoop
